27942.<center>心を乗せねば 歌は 歌とはならぬ。\n心は心から伝わり 心を伝え:
A true song derives its essence
from the heart. Words that express
the heart pave the way.

27943.<center>恵みの歌と 導きの歌。ふたつの歌が心を伝える。\n心ふるえる場所:
The Song of Grace and the Song of Guidance.
Two heartfelt songs echoing in a place where
emotions quiver, let both melodies resonate.

27944.「調査員にも頼んで 心ふるえる場所というのが\n どこを指すのか 調べてもらった:
We even asked the investigators to look into
the Heart-shaking Haven, but unfortunately,
they have no idea...

27945.「心ふるえる場所とは なんだ！？\n なぜ ここまでして ラーディス王は\n 男:
What is this Heart-shaking Haven?
Why did King Ladis go to such
lengths to seal the King's Song?!

27946.「……どなったりして すまない。\n 手がかりが つかめなくて\n イライラして:
...Sorry for yelling at you. I guess I was
frustrated because I didn't have a clue.

27947.「まさに今 手詰まりの状態なんだ。\n 君のチカラを借りたいところだが もはや\:
I'm at a complete loss right now. I'd love to
ask for your help, but I don't even know what
to ask for anymore...

27948.「……おっと これは いかん！\n そろそろ 恵みの歌を唄う時間だな。:
...Oops, I almost forgot! It's
time to sing the Song of Grace.

27949.「わかった。バルコニーへ行こう。: All right. Let us proceed to the balcony.

27951.「<pc>君。せっかく 来たんだ。\n 君も近くで 母上の歌を聴いていくといい。:
You did come all this way, so why not listen
to Mother's song up close? We should hurry
over there.

27953.「導きの歌が 恵みの効果を生みだせなければ\n 僕は 王にはなれない……。:
If the Song of Guidance can't produce any
grace, then I'll never become a king...

27954.「お前には 王になる資格がない……と\n ラーディス王が 言っているのかもしれな:
Perhaps this is King Ladis' way of telling me
I don't have what it takes to become king...

27955.「……オーディス王子。\n あなたは なぜ 王になりたいのですか？:
...Prince Odis. Why do you
want to become a king?

27956.「どうしたんだ セーリア。\n 急に そんなことを聞くなんて。:
What's the matter, Celia? I can't believe
you're asking me that all of a sudden.

27958.「……それは 守りたいからだ。:
...it's because there are things I want to
protect.

27959.「母上や父上……。いや このウェナ諸島に暮らす\n すべての人々を 王となって:
To protect both my mother and father...no, all
the people of the Wena Islands. That's why I
want to become king.

27960.「私の父も かつて そう言っていました。: My father once said that same thing.

27961.「……心ふるえる場所。それは知恵の眠る遺跡。\n 波紋の音叉が 導く先にあります:
The Heart-shaking Haven...that is the Sleeping
Wisdom Ruins. The Rippling Resonators will
guide your way...

27963.「心ふるわせ ふたつが ひとつ。\n ひとつの心 恵みを与えん……。:
Unite two trembling hearts, and they merge
into one. A solitary heart imparts grace...

27964.「この言葉を 波紋の音叉に伝えて……。:
Convey these words to the Rippling
Resonators...

27966.「母上。心ふるえる場所のことが わかりました。\n セーリアが 教えてくれたので:
Mother, I found out about the Heart-
shaking Haven. Celia told me about it.

27967.「……ふむ。\n くわしい話は 女王の間で聞こう。:
I see... Let's discuss this further in the
throne room.

27968.「<pc>君も 来てくれ。\n 君のチカラを 借りることになるぞ！:
Please come too, <pc>.
I'm going to need your strength once more!

27969.「<pc>君 ありがとう。\n 君のおかげで 危険な目にあわずに\n 母上を こ:
Thank you for your help. I was able to bring
Mother here without putting her in harm's
way.

27970.「僕は ここへ来るのは はじめてなんだ。\n この音叉のおかげで 恵みの歌の効果:
This is my first time here. I wonder if these
tuning forks will help the Song of Grace to
spread throughout the islands?

27971.「たしか この波紋の音叉も\n ラーディス王が作ったと 言われていたな。\n な:
It's said that these tuning forks were also
created by King Ladis. What an amazing king
he must've been...

27972.「心を伝える言葉が 扉を開くと\n 王の石版に 書かれていたな。\n セーリアか:
The words that express the heart pave the
way, as written on the King's Tablet. I'll
try chanting the words that Celia told me.

27973.「心ふるわせ ふたつが ひとつ。\n ひとつの心 恵みを与えん……。:
Unite two trembling hearts, and they merge
into one. A solitary heart imparts grace...

27974.「これは……。もしや 旅の扉というものか？\n この扉に入れば いいんだな……。:
Is this...a teleportal? I wonder if it's
okay to go through...

27975.「ならば 行こうではないか。\n この先に 何があるか 確かめよう。:
We should head through, then. Let's see what
lies ahead for ourselves.

27976.「僕と母上が 先に入ってみる。\n <pc>君も すぐに来てほしい。:
Mother and I will go in first.
Please follow right behind us, <pc>.

27977.「おお <pc>。女王は無事か？\n 魔物に襲われたり しなかったか？\n 旅に:
Oh, <pc>! Is the queen all right?
Was she attacked by monsters? Did the
journey tire her too much?

27978.「いいか？ 王子が そばにいるとはいえ\n 決して 女王から目を離すなよ！:
Got it? Even though the prince is by her
side, never take your eyes off the queen!

27981.「ここが 心ふるえる場所に まちがいない。\n だが またしても 石版だけか……:
This must be the Heart-shaking Haven.
But there's only just a tablet here, too...

27982.「ずいぶんと 細かく文字が刻んであるな。\n とにかく 読んでみよう。:
The inscription is very finely engraved.
Anyway...let's see what it says.

27983.<center>我らのチカラでは 暴君を滅ぼせない。\nもはや 残された手は た:
We cannot destroy the Tyrant with our own
strength. There is but one option left.

27984.<center>時を止める永遠の水の中に 暴君を封じ込め\n誰かが 見張りつづけ:
Seal the beast within the time-stopping Waters
of Eternity, with someone keeping watch. As
king, that was supposed to be my own duty.

27985.<center>だが それは同時に 絶望から立ち直ろうとあえぐ\nウェディの民を:
I hesitated until the end, torn between that
and abandoning the ever-struggling Weddie
people.

27986.<center>私が 迷いを断ち切れずにいた ある日\n我が娘セーリアが 暴君を:
During one of my days of hesitation, my
daughter Celia took it upon herself to take
the Tyrant within the Waters of Eternity.

27987.<center>……私の心の迷いを 見抜いたのであろう。\nセーリアは 私に代わ:
She must have seen through the doubts
in my heart... Celia, on my behalf, became
a seal maiden.

27988.<center>私は 愛する家族を犠牲にしてしまった。\n私にとって 家族は宝だ:
I sacrificed my beloved family. My family was
my treasure. Even if it meant sacrificing my
life, it was a treasure I wanted to protect.

27989.<center>私は なげいた……。\n王であるがゆえに 自らを犠牲とできぬ\n:
I lamented... because I couldn't sacrifice
myself due to being a king. I couldn't help
but curse my own situation.

27991.<center>父として 愛する家族を守る。\nそれこそが 男の役目なのだと。:
A father protects their beloved family.
That is the true duty of a man.

27992.<center>私は 王位を妻に譲り\n王という立場を捨てた。:
I relinquished the throne to my wife
and renounced my position as king.

27993.<center>そして 以後 男が王位に就くことを禁じた。\n王家にある男は 家:
Henceforth, I prohibited men from ascending
to the throne. Men in the royal family must
focus on protecting their families.

27994.<center>この石版を 手にせし者よ。\nそなたは 禁を破り\n男の王になる:
To the one who holds this tablet in your
hand. You are the one who will break this
taboo and become a king.

27995.<center>もし そなたが 王でありながら\n家族を守ることも できると言う:
If you can prove that you can protect
your family while being a king, show the
strength of your conviction here.

27996.「そうか……。ラーディス王が\n 男王を禁じた原因は セーリアが\n 封印の巫女:
I see... So the reason King Ladis forbade
princes from becoming kings is because
Celia became a seal maiden...

27997.「しかし 思いの強さを示してみせろとは\n いったい どうすれば……。:
But how am I supposed to show my
conviction...?

27999.「ゴォォ……。我は ラーディスの誓いの証人。\n その証たる名 ラディスオー。:
OoooOooo... I am a witness to Ladis' oath.
I am called Keen Ladis...

28000.「ラーディスの誓い。その強さ。\n 超えるというならば 我を倒してみせよ……。:
The strength of Ladis' oath... If you claim
that you can surpass it, then you must defeat
me...

28002.「どうやら こいつを倒すことで\n 思いの強さを示せということのようだ。\n <:
It seems that defeating this creature will
prove the strength of my conviction.
Please lend me your strength, <cs_pchero>!

28006.「<cs_pchero>君！ こいつは\n かなり やっかいな相手のようだ！！:
<cs_pchero>! He seems to be quite
the opponent!

28007.「僕は 母上を守らなくてはならない！\n 君のチカラを貸してくれ！！:
I must protect Mother! Please lend me your
strength!

28008.「ラーディスの誓い。その強さ。\n 超えるというならば 我を倒してみせよ……。:
The strength of Ladis' oath... If you claim
that you can surpass it, then you must defeat
me...

28010.「……よくやってくれた <cs_pchero>君。\n 結局 君に頼りっぱなしだ:
...Well done, <cs_pchero>.
I ended up relying on you entirely yet again.

28014.「ゴオォォォ。よくぞ 我を倒し……た。:
OooooOooo... You have done well...to defeat
me...

28016.「ラーディス流の剣技……。\n 使わせてもらいましたぞ。ラーディス王よ。:
The Ladis-style swordsmanship...
Thank you for giving me the chance to
use it, King Ladis.

28018.「王の石版に 書かれていたとおり\n 我が王家の男は 何を置いても\n 家族を守:
As it was written on the King's Tablet, a
man of our royal family takes an oath to
protect his family above all else.

28019.「まだ 自分の家族を持たない お前に\n 実感できるかは わからぬが\n この責:
As you do not have a family of your own yet,
I'd wager you don't fully comprehend it. But,
this is a tremendous responsibility.

28020.「お前は 王として国を守りつつ\n この 大切な家族を守り抜く責任をも\n 同時:
You are attempting to bear the responsibility
of protecting both the country as a king and
your precious family at the same time.

28021.「今のお前に それができるとは思えぬ。\n だが これから先 死すらも恐れぬ覚悟:
As you are now, I don't believe you can do it. However, if you continue on this path with the same determination, you may one day
achieve it.

28024.「……それが 覚悟した者の返事か？:
...is that really the answer of someone who
claims they are prepared?

28025.「はい！ 僕には 覚悟があります。\n 家族も国の民も。このウェナ諸島に暮らす\:
Yes! I am prepared! For the sake of my family, my country, and everyone in the Wena Islands... I will become king and protect
them all!

28026.「その道が どれほど険しい道であろうと\n 僕は決して くじけたりしません！！:
No matter how treacherous the path forward is,
I will let nothing stand in my way!!

28027.「ならば 唄うがいい。女王とともに。: Then you must sing along with the queen.

28028.「さあ オーディス。唄うのだ。\n 今こそ 導きの歌の極意を得よう。:
Come, Odis. Let us sing, and at last master
the secret of the Song of Guidance.

28030.<center>……海に生まれ 海に生きる。\nそれが我ら ウェディの民。:
...Born of the sea, by the sea.
That's who we are, the Weddies.

28031.<center>母なる海に祈りを捧げ\n我らは求める 神の恵みを。:
We pray to the Mother Sea, and we seek
blessings from above.

28032.<center>大いなる海の神よ。\n我らの命 我らの思い\n守りたまえ 清めた:
Great god of the sea...
Our lives, our thoughts, protect us, cleanse
us...

28033.<center>荒ぶる海よ しずまりたまえ。\n怒れる海よ しずまりたまえ。:
Calm yourself, o raging sea...
Be still, o furious sea...

28034.<center>父なる海が 我らに教える。\nはげしい流れが 命を育む。:
The Father Sea teaches us;
these vigorous currents nurture life.

28035.<center>大いなる海の神よ。\n我らの願い 我らの誓い\nかなえたまえ 守:
O great god of the vast sea, fulfill
our wishes, our vows...
Protect us, please...

28036.「やった……。成功だ！\n 育みの効果が ついに現れたぞ！！:
We did it...it worked!! The effects of
nurturing have finally manifested!

28037.「これで オーディスは 王となる資格を得た。\n 男の王が現れることを拒む者は\:
And with that, you are now qualified to become
a king. There is no longer anyone who opposes
the crowning of a male king.

28038.「ありがとう <cs_pchero>君！\n 君が 手を貸してくれた おかげだ。:
Thank you so much, <cs_pchero>!
I couldn't have done this without you. Now
I can finally become king!!

28039.「ヴェリナード城に 戻ろう。\n <cs_pchero>君にも 礼をしなくてはな:
Let's head back to Verinard Castle.
I must express my gratitude to you!

28040.「では アーベルク団長は 父上が\n 剣の達人であることを 知っていたんですね？:
Then, Commander Aberuku...you knew
that my father was a master swordsman?

28041.「はっ。メルー公からは 他言無用と\n 申しつけられておりましたゆえ\n 王子に:
Yes. Lord Meru ordered me to keep it a secret
from everyone. That meant even you, too.

28042.「メルー公は かつて ヴェリナードの剣神と\n 呼ばれたほどの 伝説の魔法戦士。:
Lord Meru was once a legendary armamentalist.
So much so that he was known as the
Swordmaster of Verinard.

28043.「我ら 王立魔法戦士団の魔法戦士たちが\n 束になっても かなう お方ではないの:
Even the combined strength of the Royal
Armamentalists would be no match for him.

28044.「そ……それほど…ですか……。\n しかし そんな伝説を持つ父上の実力を\n 知:
I-I see... I'm surprised... I had no idea
that my father possessed such power...

28045.「メルー公は 王家に入ったとき\n そのチカラを 女王ディオーレ様の御身を\n:
When Lord Meru joined the royal family, he
swore an oath to use his powers only for
the protection of Queen Diore.

28046.「伝説は その時 闇へと封じられました。\n メルー公は ヴェリナード王国に隠さ:
The legend was then sealed deep away. Hidden within the Verinard Kingdom is the country's most powerful protector and a true
armamentalist. That is your father.

28047.「父上が そんな すごい人だったとは。\n 僕は 何を見ていたんだろう……。:
I had no idea my father was so incredible.
What was I even seeing...?

28048.「おおっ <pc>君。来ていたんだな。\n 待たせてしまって すまない。:
Oh, <pc>! You've arrived.
Sorry to keep you waiting.

28049.「君には 本当に世話になってしまった。\n さあ こちらへ。報酬を用意してあるん:
You've truly done so much for me. Please
come this way. I have something for you.

28050.「<pc>君。改めて礼を言おう。\n 君のおかげで 僕は 王となる資格を得られた:
I must thank you once more, <pc>.
Because of you, I am now qualified to become
king. I hope this reward serves you well.

28051.「僕は ラーディス王の誓いを知った。\n その上で 国の民だけでなく\n 自分の:
I have learned of King Ladis' oath. I declare
that I will be a king who can protect not only
his people, but his own family as well.

28052.「だが そのためには 僕は まだまだ\n 努力を重ねなくてはならないと思う。\n:
However, for that reason, I believe I need
to work even harder than before. I hope you
all will continue to lend me your strength.

28053.「母上は 王としての心得を僕に。:
Mother. Please teach me what it takes to
become king.

28054.「もちろんだ。これからも きびしくいくぞ。:
Of course. I will continue to be strict with
you.

28055.「セーリアは 王家の歴史を僕に。:
And Celia. Please tell me more about the
royal family's history.

28056.「私が伝えられることなら……。\n もう 隠すべきことは ありません。:
Whatever it is you want to know, I'll tell
you... There is no longer anything to hide.

28058.「えっ なんだ？ ワシもか？:
Huh? What is it? You need something from me,
too?

28059.「ラーディス流の剣技。教えてくれますね？:
The Ladis-style swordsmanship. Will you teach
it to me?

28060.「……お前が 修行に耐えられるならな。: Only if you can endure the training.

28061.「そして <pc>君は\n 僕の かけがえのない友人として\n これからも よろ:
And last, but not least... <pc>.
You are an irreplaceable friend. I
know that I can always count on you!

28062.「僕が 王になるには まだまだ\n やるべきことが たくさん ある。\n これか:
I still have a lot to do before I can become
king. Things are going to get really busy!

28063.どこからともなく 声が聞こえる……。: You hear a mysterious voice echo from afar...

28064.<center>心ふるわせ ふたつが ひとつ。\nひとつの心 恵みを与えん……。:
Unite two trembling hearts, and they merge
into one. A solitary heart imparts grace...

60575.<center>心ふるわせ ふたつが ひとつ。\nひとつの心 恵みを与えん……。:
Unite two trembling hearts, and they merge
into one. A solitary heart imparts grace...

60576.どこからともなく 声が聞こえる……。: You hear a mysterious voice echo from afar...

60577.<center>心ふるわせ ふたつが ひとつ。\nひとつの心 恵みを与えん……。:
Unite two trembling hearts, and they merge
